[Portrait]Angry Voice
[Dialog]Where is he? Where'd the
shuffler steal off to?{END}

[Portrait]Angry Voice
[Dialog]Hear that? He's on the roof!{END}

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]I'm trapped...{END}

[Portrait]Rogue
[Dialog]It don't do to have strangers sticking
their noses in our little hideaway.{END}

Then mayhap you might hang a signboard
above the door, so we would know this
place for a den of thieves!{END}

Ha! The cull's got brass. Too bad
it's steel he'll be wanting.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Something is amiss here.{END}

A lot of visitors today.
Small matter. Stick 'em

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]F-Father... Forgive me...{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Are you hurt?{END}

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]I am fine, thank you.

And yours?{END}

I am <Ramza>.
<Ramza> Beoulve.{END}

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]<Ramza> Beoulve!?{END}

What of it?{END}

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]'Tis naught. Forgive me.

Might I inquire as to the direction

We make for the royal capital. And you?

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]A gracious offer, but I fear my road

[Portrait]Orran
[Dialog]And with you as well.{END}

[Portrait]Orran
